titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the better ordering of those who repaire to the court, for their cure of the disease called the kings euill.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Court at White-Hall, the seuenteenth day of Iune, in the fourth yeere of Our Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
